description: Shopfront signage to be suspended internally from the interior of the store to the face of the shopfront glazing. 2 internally illuminated 'Boots' logos in 10mm LED acrylic, static lumination of approx. 150 candela per square metre - installed internally above shopfront entrance doors. Additional sub-category signs internally illuminated in 10mm LED acrylic, static lumination of approx. 150 candela per square metre displaying 'Pharmacy', 'Beauty', 'Wellness' and 'Opticians' suspended internally to High Street and Wrights Lane Elevation, with Arcade Elevation displaying 'Pharmacy' and 'Beauty'. 2no. internally illuminated projecting signage installed to High Street and Wrights Lane elevation displaying green Pharmacy cross installed to both faces.
